name: OnThisDay
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill

Developer Terms of Use
des: Surprise friends and family by announcing their birthdays, wedding anniversaries on their Alexa device. Hear what happened on this day in history.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
